message: Neither in that order, nor the reverse.
I gather from a previous response here on Convore that it should be something like (for kramdown) `set :kramdown, :smartypants => true`, but my quotes remain as straight as ever.
It may be worth mentioning that I am also using middleman-blog, if that information helps.

Ah, I see. It seems the currently released middleman-blog doesn't pass any custom options to the markdown engine. I've logged the bug and will make sure it's resolved in the next release: https://github.com/tdreyno/middleman-blog/issues/9
